extension.deleteModalMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the "{{name}}" extension?
extension.emptyStateInfoMessage: There are no extensions available. Please click on the button below to import one.
extension.errorDeletingExtension: Unexpected server error deleting extension with ID of "{{extensionId}}".
extension.extensionImportFailedMessage: An error occurred trying to import extension with ID "{{extensionId}}"
extension.extensionsPageDescription: Extensions provide custom features for use in integrations. Find out more at $t(shared:project.name) Help.
extension.importDndInstructions: Drag 'n' drop one file here, or click to select the file using a file chooser dialog.
extension.importExtensionTip: Select the .jar file of the extension to import
extension.importHelpMessage: Only one file can be uploaded. The accepted file type is .jar.
extension.importInvalidFileMessage: An error has occurred while trying to process the extension. Please, check the input file.
extension.importUpdateMessage: To update an extension, click Extensions in the breadcrumbs above, and in the list of extensions, click Update for the appropriate extension.
